system.descriptionText:
1. Lost Dynasty (400xp): +1 to Group's Profit Factor, +1 Fate Point. Work the the GM to create a Lost Claim or Resource that you intend to seek out.
2. Rogue Planet (200xp): +3 Willpower. Gain any one Exploration Skill as trained Skill. Gain 1d5 Insanity Points. Work with GM to creat a lost world you have only partly explored.
3. Beyond the Pale (100xp): Gain 1d5 Corruption and 1d5 Insanity. Gain two Trained Forbidden Lore Skills, or add +10 to two already known Forbidden Lore Skills.
